Select pro.project_name,s.status_name,p.contract_no,p.grade,p.od,p.wt,p.p_length,p.weight,p.heat_no,o.* from lab_testing_liquid_epoxy o left join pipe_basic_info p on p.pipe_no=o.pipe_no left join contract_info c on p.contract_no=c.contract_no left join project_info pro on c.project_no=pro.project_no left join pipe_status s on s.status_code=p.status
AND o.pipe_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pipe_no},'%')
AND o.operator_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{operator_no},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.operation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{begin_time},'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.operation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')<DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{end_time},INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
ORDER BY o.id DESC limit #{skip},#{take}

select count(*) from lab_testing_liquid_epoxy o left join pipe_basic_info p on p.pipe_no=o.pipe_no left join contract_info c on p.contract_no=c.contract_no left join project_info pro on c.project_no=pro.project_no left join pipe_status s on s.status_code=p.status
AND o.pipe_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pipe_no},'%')
AND o.operator_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{operator_no},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.operation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{begin_time},'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.operation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')<DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{end_time},INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
